author: blkcbd
title: Paris and La Clef Tour is what you would expect in Paris! Well located well maintained crisp sweet but vintage!
text: I stayed four nights and ate breakfast each morning. First, this hotel is clean very new very well done. It's a vintage that looks like an Italian Yacht inside, not gaudy but very high end fixtures etc. it was quiet, extremely comfortable and the food was fabulous. The two things though about this hotel though was #1 the staff, unbelievable is how I'd describe them! They helped me indescribably day and night. Second you will not find a better located hotel in Paris around the places you'll want to walk to! I'd keep going but I'm in awe of La Clef Tour Paris
